title: 부르즈할리파에 적용된 건축기술
content:
과 콘크리트 구조물은 도시의 혁신적인 지속성을 제공한다.

The city of Burj Khalifa is a prime example of how innovative architecture and concrete construction can provide a city with sustainable features. The building itself is the tallest in the world, standing at over 2,700 feet, and is home to a variety of businesses and residential units. But what makes Burj Khalifa so unique is its sustainable design. The building was designed to use less energy and water than traditional buildings, and it includes a number of green features, such as a rainwater harvesting system and a solar power system.
